data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Bulacan, Philippines.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bulacan, Philippines

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Bulacan, Philippines by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Bulacan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 3,292,100 souls in Bulacan and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Arab people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, guide the church in Bulacan, Philippines to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Bulacan, Philippines to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 2,536,086 people in the state of Bulacan who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
